title: # 413 - Jesus Trejo & ME
description:
Today I chat with Comedian Jesus Trejo. We talk about shooting his first special, why he rode a girls bike growing up, getting robbed at gunpoint, working at the comedy store, Russell Peters, the first time he met Ian Edwards, and much more! 

Catch Jesus Trejo’s special “Stay at Home Son” premiering May 29th on Showtime at 9pm!

My Brand new stand up special "Hey Big Boy" is streaming right now on Netflix! 

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: www.bertbertbert.com

Twitter: www.Twitter.com/bertkreischer

Facebook: www.Facebook.com/BertKreischer

Instagram: www.Instagram.com/bertkreischer

Youtube: www.Youtube.com/user/Akreischer
